oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Kayne Avenue Baptist Church, 1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the congregation from Kayne Avenue Baptist Church standing outside. This African American church was located on Twelfth Avenue South, across from the Carter-Lawrence School. When the building burned down it was replaced by a new church further down Twelfth Avenue South. Some people identified in the photograph include Adeline Black, her sisters Hannah Black Teague and Geneva Black Midgett Blakemore, Edna Earle Hebb, Carrie Timberlake Jones Hoggett, Ewell Cotton, Jenny Robertson, and Mary Cotton Overton. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Black, Adeline; Teague, Hannah Black; Blakemore, Geneva Black Midgett; Hebb, Edna Earle; Hoggett, Carrie Timberland Jones; Cotton, Ewell; Robertson, Jenny; Overton, Mary Cotton
Kayne Avenue Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
